website_summaries.verdict: The ultimate outdoor women's boot from KEEN with waterproof leather and synthetic materials.
pros: Keeps feet dry and protected in wet and cold conditions
Insulated and waterproof with good tread on soles for hiking
Warm insulation rating of -25 degrees Fahrenheit or -32 degrees Celsius
cons: Sizing can be a bit narrow

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good looking!
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these shoes on a few dog walks on the trails in our neighborhood and they are very comfortable, they also keep my feet dry when I'm walking through the tall wet grass. Update: I've walked about 20 miles in them so far and they are getting more comfortable each time. I did add a pair of Dr Scholls tri-comfort insoles for extra comfort since I walk 3-5 miles a day and that has helped out a lot with the longer distances.
customer_reviews.author: ZiMaLiCo

customer_reviews.title: great boots!
customer_reviews.text: these are perfect for winter/spring hiking - waterproof, good tread on the soles, and insulated. i need a squarish toe box, and these keens do the job without making my feet look ginormous. just a suggestion, but if you've never had a pair of keens, go try some on. once you know your size, you can be confident that the keens you order online will fit.
customer_reviews.author: joaniec

customer_reviews.title: KEEN Women's Oakridge Mid Polar WP Boot
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a half size larger than I normally do, and they fit great. They were very comfortable. I wore them everyday for a week as I did a lot of hiking. There were days I forgot that I had on hiking boots. They were waterproof, which was great when hiking in mid and shallow water.
customer_reviews.author: Maile Jacobsen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit. i broke my heel and ankle years ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear an 8 and bought an 8. Perfect fit. i broke my heel and ankle years ago and have problems with arthritis so sometime I cannot stand. These are an extremely comfortable fit and a snug fit without rubbing. Keeps my toes warm and dry.
customer_reviews.author: carol robbins

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots, perfect comfort right out of the box.. did not need to break them in. Wore them on a great adventure in the cold and they kept my feet warm & dry (also had winter socks on). They are VERY lightweight. Definitely will buy these again. Will probably wear even during the summer... but will update if they are to warm.
customer_reviews.author: footlady

customer_reviews.title: Nice Boots for Wide Feet!!
customer_reviews.text: So the boots were pretty comfortable on my 8 mile mountain hike until nearing the end, then my feet started hurting. (I'm going add insoles before my next hike for added comfort) They are for wide feet, which mine are, so that was nice. But the Best thing about these boots, they are waterproof. I was trampling through the creeks and my feet stayed totally dry. I was super happy about that. Overall I really liked them.
customer_reviews.author: T. Claire

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: These do run big! At first I ordered a 9, which I wear in boots, and I had to return them for an 8.5. I ordered my first pair early (thank goodness). I broke them in by hiking 10 miles when I was on my trip to Portland, OR. I brought my moleskin just in case I was developing blisters, and I never got one! These boots are super comfy and of course perfect for hiking!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice pair of winter hiking boots
customer_reviews.text: Nice winter boot for hiking around in the snow. It gets really warm with medium weight Smart wool socks and can cause your feet to sweat if it's too warm outside so go light on socks.
customer_reviews.author: Geochick

customer_reviews.title: Finally found the perfect hiking boots
customer_reviews.text: They're perfect. It has very good quality. Comfortable. I ordered half a size up to leave room for thick socks but the fitting is so good that even with thin socks my feet stay in place and don't slide to the front.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Stiff but functional
customer_reviews.text: They look great, fit a bit large, and are pretty stiff. My ankles hurt after wearing them each time. Hoping they start to feel better soon. Overall happy with them though.
customer_reviews.author: B.K. Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof, Great Fit and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I love these hiking boots ... I went camping and hiking and they took a beating from nature all elements... massive rain, hail, mud slides and almost jungle terrain. Amazing! Waterproof! Extreme comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Member

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. The workmanship is of quality. My feet do not get wet when wearing in the rain. Will buyer as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great. Comfortable, not too heavy, weather resistant. I wear an 8 in all my other shoes, but 8.5 in these or sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sheffield

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots!
customer_reviews.text: Wore this out hiking in Colorado. They were awesome. No break in time. Walked thru water ...no leaks. Most comfortable hiking boots I have had!
customer_reviews.author: radams

customer_reviews.title: These are very nice but feel narrower than regular Keens
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice but feel narrower than regular Keens. Because of bunions I need pretty wide toe box. Have not tried them on the trail yet.
customer_reviews.author: Wolferson

customer_reviews.title: High quality, comfortable hiking boots for multiple terrains
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite hiking boots. I hiked all over Washington state and Northern Oregon in these boots and my feet never ached, no blisters, and always dry (even after stepping into a stream).
customer_reviews.author: Britni Russell

customer_reviews.title: Arizona is beautiful but presents a lot of challenges where hiking is ...
customer_reviews.text: These boots totally rock! I've already used them for 3 hikes. Arizona is beautiful but presents a lot of challenges where hiking is concerned. You encounter loose gravel, and rocks to scale. Being that they were new boots I was cautious at first. But it didn't take long to know how much I could trust them. I can't wait for the next hike!
customer_reviews.author: Amy S. Kalm

customer_reviews.title: worth the buy!
customer_reviews.text: Wore these on a 6 mile bike... they were great! Waterproof also... hiked along marsh and they really held their own. Will be wearing these on many more hikes!
customer_reviews.author: Story Girl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These boots are amazing and comfortable! Very durable and waterproof. Perfect for hikes.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny M.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good - going to give them a try at glacier ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good - going to give them a try at glacier bay next week! Fit is great and they feel great from the start
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, true to size
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, true to size, warm, waterproof so far, great non-slip tread--Keene is my new favorite brand for boots. I have a taller pair for deeper snow and I love them too.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are wonderful. Great for hiking. The sizes ran true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra J Gouvion

customer_reviews.title: which longs walks is good with a neuroma
customer_reviews.text: at first felt they were too narrow, but as I walked more in them, they 'give' a little, which longs walks is good with a neuroma, as I have.
customer_reviews.author: Suejoku

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Full support- heavier than I expected but excellent hiking boot.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes for Slush and Snow!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new Keenan's. At first, they were a tad stiff, but it did not take long to break them.
customer_reviews.author: Lone Jaguar

customer_reviews.title: Love these "moon" boots
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 9 but after trying on a pair at Cabela's a half size up, I decided to go that route and ordered a 9 1/2 for more room and they are perfect! I use these boots for hiking through disc golf courses for stability for my weak ankles and Achilles Tendon's - the best part is they are COMPLETELY waterproof so no more soggy socks halfway through the course! Also Cabela's had these same exact KEENS on Sale for $30+, which is why I will ALWAYS look on Amazon before purchasing anything worthwhile.
customer_reviews.author: Bri Pete

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Seem to be great quality. I haven't used them for my big hike yet (still trying to break them in) but will update this review after. Update: I was not disappointed with this purchase. Great boots!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Duhon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit and comfort. Waterproof as described. Iceland tested & approved.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife. Used on a trip to Iceland with limited break-in. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Scotticus Luzicus

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are an amazing hiking shoe and I always have been satisfied with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: tea 3

customer_reviews.title: ... a few days but so far they have been great in Wisconsin slush
customer_reviews.text: Have only had these boots a few days but so far they have been great in Wisconsin slush, ice and snow.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: perfect for landscaper
customer_reviews.text: Large toe box,waterproof and warm.This is my fourth pair of keen shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally replaces the old Keens with these newer designed one!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected. I have 5 yr old Keens that I just hated to give up but am glad I found that the newer style fits the same. I always order up a half size for thicker socks. I wear a 6.5 so ordered a 7. They are not narrow and give my toes room to move. My foot is not narrow to begin with either.
customer_reviews.author: Koda's Maki Girl

customer_reviews.title: Best boots EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Great boots - not as tall as the Keen Delta, but same construction. Would like to see 400g insulation for more warmth. Bring back the KEEN Delta! Best boots ever!
customer_reviews.author: PAT FDIA

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: they are nice boots. i returned them because i am picky about shoes, and they just didnt have the perfect feel, but they did feel like solid boots. if you like hikers and need insulation try these on.
customer_reviews.author: A. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Nice Winter Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a warm winter shoe that was nice to wear at work as well as be functional for the weather! They fit perfect, look good and keep my toes toasty!
customer_reviews.author: Garden Girl

customer_reviews.title: They are quite warm and will be great for fall and winter hikes
customer_reviews.text: I wish they were a little bit wider but they are not uncomfortable. I'm just used to the width of barefoot shoes. They are quite warm and will be great for fall and winter hikes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Winter Boots!
customer_reviews.text: Got these boots this morning and have spent several hours shoveling wet, slushy snow. Feet stayed warm and dry. Very comfortable too, thanks to the way Keen shoes allow adequate room for toes. I wear a size 8 shoe and the size 8 fit well. I plan to buy these in another color in case they become unavailable at some point. Update: Just ordered a second pair so I now have both colors. I've been wearing the first pair throughout January, and I'm actually enjoying winter, with warm feet.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

product_meta.title: KEEN Oakridge Mid Polar Waterproof Boot - Women's Moon Mist/Desert Sage 6
product_meta.description: Keen womens OAKRIDGE MID POLAR MOON MIST/DESERT SAGE made of leather
feature_bullets: Made in the USA or Imported
Cleansport NXT for natural odor control
